fields.text:
Despois de considerar todas as posibilidades discutidas no fío de discusión para o galego relativo a este concepto chegouse á seguinte conclusión:

lapela é a única opción válida dado que as demais non se poden aplicar a este concepto, ou a que sendo aplicables (caso de separador) o seu emprego pode dar a confusión.

fields.name: Preferred
fields.description: This administrative status is used to indicate that the tagged translation is the preferred one for this particular translation's concept and language.

fields.name: Admitted
fields.description: This administrative status is used to indicate that the tagged translation is an admitted one for this particular translation's concept and language despite the fact that can exist another translation which is the preferred one.

fields.name: Not recommended
fields.description: This administrative status is used to indicate that the tagged translation shouldn't be used for this particular translation's concept and language.

fields.name: Castelanismo
fields.description: Word influenced by spanish language.

fields.name: Lusism
fields.description: Word influenced by portuguese language.

fields.name: Anglicism
fields.description: Word influenced by english language.

fields.name: Galicism
fields.description: Word influenced by french language.

fields.note: Breve exemplo de nota sobre un concepto.

fields.definition_text:
In computing, a window is a visual area containing some kind of user interface. It usually has a rectangular shape that can overlap with the area of other windows. It displays the output of and may allow input to one or more processes.

Windows are primarily associated with graphical displays, where they can be manipulated with a mouse cursor.

A graphical user interface (GUI) using windows as one of its main "metaphors" is called a windowing system.
Área visual que contén algún tipo de interface de usuario. Normalmente ten unha forma rectangular e poden conter outros elementos como botóns, listas...

Unha lapela ou separador é un implemento gráfico que en aplicacións informáticas permite lembrar outras opcións á parte da que está en uso. Isto pode referirse ás lapelas tanto de páxinas web como ás dos propios navegadores ou outro tipo de programas (son moi comúns en follas de cálculo).
Na tradución ao galego do OpenOffice en 2006 e de Windows Vista en 2007-2008 (produto elaborado por Imaxin Software e revisado por Termigal) usouse separador, aínda que esta é a denominación para un produto comercial e iso non inclúe necesariamente a súa preferencia xenérica.

In the area of graphical user interfaces (GUI), a tabbed document interface (TDI) is one that allows multiple documents to be contained within a single window, using tabs as a navigational widget for switching between sets of documents. It is an interface style most commonly associated with web browsers, web applications, text editors and preference panes.
The act and result of pressing the "Tab" key.
Acción e resultado de premer a tecla «tabulador».
Tab key (abbreviation of tabulator key) on a keyboard is used to advance the cursor to the next tab stop.
Tecla do teclado situada normalmente enriba da tecla «Maiúsculas» que insire caracteres de «tabulación».

fields.definition: An email attachment is a computer file sent along with an email message. One or more files can be attached to any email message, and be sent along with it to the recipient. This is typically used as a simple method to share documents and images. A paper clip image is the standard image for an attachment in an email client.
In computer (software) technology, a wildcard character can be used to substitute for any other character or characters in a string.

fields.name: External cross reference
fields.description: Pointer to an external reference information or explanatory text about the concept. For example a link to a Wikipedia article.

fields.name: Image
fields.description: Reference (URI, URL, or local file path) to a graphic file that depicts or explains the concept.

fields.name: MathML
fields.description: Link to a MathML representantion of the concept or some other resource that may help understanding the actual concept.

fields.name: Audio
fields.description: Link to external audio file that may help understanding the actual concept.

fields.description: Link to external video file that may help understanding the actual concept.

Todos os navegadores web actuais permiten a navegación con lapelas.
